content: what is the price of gold

The price of gold in India today, January 26, 2026, is as follows: 
- 24 karat gold is priced at ₹16,271 per gram, 
- 22 karat gold is priced at ₹14,915 per gram, and 
- 18 karat gold is priced at ₹12,203 per gram.

Elon Musk is a businessman and entrepreneur. He was born on June 28, 1971, in Pretoria, South Africa, and is currently a South African-born American entrepreneur. Elon Musk is known for his leadership of several companies, including Tesla, SpaceX, Twitter, and xAI. He has also been recognized as one of the wealthiest individuals in the world. Additionally, he has co-founded the electronic payment firm, and has been involved in various other ventures and initiatives throughout his career.

what is the networth of elon musk
As of January 2026, the estimated net worth of Elon Musk is around $788 billion USD, according to the available search results. This makes him the wealthiest person in the world.
